title: Sacrilegious to Buddhism: Asgiriya Mahanayaka Thera hands over an appeal to the President
content: – by Janaka Alahapperuma – President Mahinda Rajapaksa worshipped at the Sri Dalada Maligawa in Kandy this morning (April 18) and received blessings for the Sinhala and Tamil New Year. The President participated in many religious observances before the Sacred Tooth Relic….
